reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez makes even the most difficult math concepts understandable. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's enthusiasm for literature is evident in every class. Her reading list is diverse and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor seems knowledgeable, but his teaching style is confusing. More practical examples would help.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's labs are well-organized and her explanations are crystal clear. She's always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are informative, but he tends to go off on tangents. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown incorporates current events into her teachings, making the subject very relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's lectures are hard to follow. He assumes too much prior knowledge from students.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's passion for the environment is inspiring. Her field trips are the highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson encourages critical thinking and lively debates. His classes are never boring.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's course content is fascinating, but her grading can be inconsistent and unclear at times.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's knowledge of art is encyclopedic. His virtual museum tours are an excellent learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Carter presents balanced viewpoints and encourages students to form their own opinions. Very engaging.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's assignments are often unclear, and he's not very responsive to emails. Course needs improvement.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rossi makes language study fun and interactive. Her research projects are particularly enlightening.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Kim has good real-world examples, but his lectures can be repetitive. More variety would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Murphy's enthusiasm for cultural studies is infectious. Her assignments encourage creative thinking.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is a musical genius. His composition workshops are challenging but incredibly rewarding.
